name: 021_gatehouse_get_put
expected_full_outputs:
*** Entrance ***

You stand upon the ancient drawbridge at the entrance of Dark Castle. The murky waters of the moat swirl beneath your feet and, before you, barring your way, is the ominous front gate.

Behind you, just beyond the drawbridge, is an extremely old and rusty postbox besides which stands a large tree with some low branches. Across the way from the postbox is a big rock covered in moss and lichen. 

There is a Front Gate to the north, a climb leading up, an Untrodden Path to the southwest, a leap down to the moat to the east, and a leap down to the moat to the west.

Unlocked

Openned. 

Your score is now 10 out of 75

*** Gatehouse ***

You are in the Gatehouse. This sparse but serviceable room guards the entrance to the main castle. Once upon a time it no-doubt bristled with alert guards bearing gleaming arms. Today, it is filled with old furniture, cobwebs, and a musty smell. Dim light filters in from the arrow slits facing the moat while the shadows at the north end of the room hint at the darkness of the main castle beyond.

Upon the wall hangs a Shiny Sword of great antinquity. 

There is a Front Gate to the south and a Foreboding Archway to the north.

There is a Wooden Shelf here. The Wooden Shelf is empty. 

The Royal Hedgehog is here. The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

You cast an apraising inner eye and take stock: Manly rough-and-tumble good looks - check, Affable demeanor paired with self-depreciating humor - check!, A lifetime of finely-honed baking skills - check!! Yep - that's you Burt - A fine specimen of a man. If not for the belching, farting, and cussing I don't know how you'd ever manage to fend off the ladies!

In your off hand you hold a Brass Lantern.

You are holding a Rusty Key. 

In your backpack you have: a Cheese Wedge, a Paper Bag, and an Earthen Jug (containing a Well Water). 

Done

Done

Done

Taken

You're not holding the Shiny Sword in your hand.

The Royal Hedgehog attacks with its Fierce Teeth and you attempt to parry with the Rusty Key!

The moment you approach the Shiny Sword the territorial Royal Hedgehog springs forward, blocks your path, and bares it's Fierce Teeth.

You are startled and compelled to leap back in surprise. 

The Royal Hedgehog attacks with its Fierce Teeth and you attempt to parry with the Rusty Key!

The moment you approach the Shiny Sword the territorial Royal Hedgehog springs forward, blocks your path, and bares it's Fierce Teeth.

You are startled and compelled to leap back in surprise. 

Cheese Wedge: Taken

Earthen Jug: Taken
